title.rendered: Indie Bookstore Day + Teacher Appreciation Week

content.rendered:
Independent Bookstore Day!

Celebrate Independent Bookstore Day with us on Saturday, April 30. Choose a FREE tote bag OR a Gottwals Books journal with every $15 purchase (limit one free item). We are proud to be Middle Georgia’s only indie bookstore chain!

Teacher Appreciation Week

Teachers, take 20% off of used books and educational products for the entire week of May 2-6. (Yes, this includes homeschool teachers!)

Tuesday, May 3, we will host a drop-in event for our teachers from 6-7:30 p.m. in our Macon and Warner Robins stores. The stores will be closed to other customers at that time. EVERY teacher (again, including homeschool teachers!) who attends the event will receive a FREE $10 gift card! We will have beverages and prize drawings throughout the night. We are thankful for your service and dedication, and we intend to show it.

Vote for Us!

Gottwals Books has been nominated for Best Book Store in both Macon and Warner Robins!  Please vote for us every day until May 1 and help us win the Best of the Best contest.

Vote!

Atlases

Warmer weather means more opportunities for travel! Before you go, pick up a Georgia Recreation Atlas. Don’t forget to round off your travel supplies with an audiobook or two!
